title: PHPin_array()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPin_array()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
$people = array("Peter", "Joe", "Glenn", "Cleveland");
if (in_array("Glenn", $people))
{
echo "Match found";
}
else
{
echo "Match not found";
}
?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPin_array()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPin_array()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPin_array()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
